definition: grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

sentences.english: You can also add 10 drops of colloidal silver as a natural preservative.
sentences.chinese: 你可以加入10滴液態膠粒銀作爲天然的防腐劑。

sentences.english: Colloidal particles are bombarded by molecules of the dispersion medium.
sentences.chinese: 膠粒會受到分散介質分子的碰撞。

sentences.english: The relative contents of calcium hydroxide in the colloid are inversely proportional to the colloidal particle size.
sentences.chinese: 膠體中氫氧化鈣相對含量與膠粒的大小成反比。

sentences.english: As a result they form biphasic or micellar structures .
sentences.chinese: 結果它們形成雙相和膠粒的結構。

sentences.english: This includes all long pimpled rubbers currently used.
sentences.chinese: 此項決議包括所有現在採用的長膠粒膠皮和套膠。

sentences.english: Similarly charged colloidal particles cannot agglomerate into larger particles.
sentences.chinese: 帶相同電荷的膠粒不能聚集成較大的顆粒。
